::Lilly::
Lilly looking in the mirror at her beastmode she was what looked like a 
cheetah with but its fur was hard long extremely sharp metallic spines more 
fitting a Porcupine or Hegdehog. While to long scthye like wings extend from 
her back."May the light of the Codia crown us with glory" And she transforms 
back into Robot mode. As blue electricy streams out her face gets some 
marking a red dot in the center of her forehead and 3 stripes on each side 
of her face.

::Koj::
"We better get ready to save ?3."

::Inu::
"yup"

::Lilly::
Not having any clue were she is sends a coded messages in High Draconic 
((Dragon Language I.E If your not a Dragon you wouldn't know it.))

::Inu::
"Koj its Lilly shes in the CF."

::Koj::
"Tell her to escape quick wait tell to get my equipment and CryoUnit"

::Inu::
Sends another message in High Draconic.
